GSD.product_version: versions from v3.10 to before v4.9.337
GSD.description:
drivers: net: qlcnic: Fix potential memory leak in qlcnic_sriov_init()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.337 by commit 15770edc01edfce773269e8a443ca8e420f6f859, it was introduced in version v3.10 by commit f197a7aa62888f27c9a7976b18eb4f040f6606ce. For more details please see the references link.
